data.name: Happy’s Humble Burger Farm: Ambush (OST)
data.detailed_description: Ambush is a dark, grimey journey that blends trap, dubstep, electro house, and psytrance, wrapping it all up with a nice cinematic bow. The grooves are massive, and the bass bombs are dangerous - a welcome ambush on the ears.
data.about_the_game: Ambush is a dark, grimey journey that blends trap, dubstep, electro house, and psytrance, wrapping it all up with a nice cinematic bow. The grooves are massive, and the bass bombs are dangerous - a welcome ambush on the ears.
